_sText:
Gg_shade2 - by drimp

Here is the second version with all the things that people wanted and more:
- Added more detail and decals.
- Made stairs instead of the strange slope things.
- Added ropes in places.
- Made the sound inside the middle bit loader.
- Crates no longer in the ground.
- Other small things added. 

Please give constructive feedback and test it out in-game.

Known bugs: None. (If you know any please contact me.)

Story: In an abandoned factory after workers where taken hostage but saved by the counter terrorists the terrorists are going in for one last battle. The counter-terrorists must defend the factory at all cost. If lost the terrorists will use it as one of their secret hideouts.

Note: I did not add HDR because of bugs that made it so I could not build the cubemaps.
Includes a custom nav file for place names and so you can test gameplay with bots.

The old maps video:
